title: Readonly setting within SQL Backend options should prevent changes to Connections
author: ali-avci
body_snippet:
Beside the requirement that when something is changed in the sql-backend options a restart has to be done. It is also required that none of the configurations might be changed after the read-only flag is set in the options. 

It turned out that a user in a shared jump server had changed some connection configuration data and the tool did save them in the normal .xml file in a faulty way. To prevent such attractions it is needed to lock the complete connection configuration when the read-only f...

comments.snippet: yes that planed to implement with user profiles - then it will be possible to set profile for a user defining what server settings he can update for example and which he just use and not save if any changes are made.
